name: Eat together
description: Make a social event to share some food and fun.

deadlineTs.description: The maximum time epoch that any user can accept to be a volunteer

startTs.description: The time epoch when the social event is going to start

endTs.description: The time epoch when the social event will end

volunteerId.description: The identifier of the volunteer that want to be a volunteer
The identifier of the volunteer that not want to be a volunteer

acceptVolunteer.description: Accept a volunteer to attend the event

volunteerId.description: The identifier of the volunteer that was accepted

refuseVolunteer.description: Refuse a volunteer to attend the event

volunteerId.description: The identifier of the volunteer that was refused

outcome.description: The reason why the task is completed

TextualMessage.description: A simple textual message from WeNet to the user

communityId.description: ID of the community related to the message

taskId.description: The identifier of the target task

TaskProposalNotification.description: This notification is used in order to propose a user to volunteer to a newly created task

communityId.description: ID of the community related to the message

taskId.description: The identifier of the target task

TaskVolunteerNotification.description: This notification is used in order to notify the task creator that a new volunteer is proposing to participate to the task

volunteerId.description: The Wenet ID of the volunteer that is applying to the task

communityId.description: ID of the community related to the message

taskId.description: The identifier of the target task

TaskSelectionNotification.description: This notification is used in order to notify the user who volunteered about the decision of the task creator

communityId.description: ID of the community related to the message

taskId.description: The identifier of the target task

TaskConcludedNotification.description:
This notification is used in order to notify task participants that a task has been completed, the outcome could be
* completed (if completed correctly)
* failed (if something went wrong)
* cancelled (the creator cancelled the task)

outcome.description: The outcome of the task (has it been completed with success or not)

communityId.description: ID of the community related to the message

taskId.description: The identifier of the target task

IncentiveMessage.description: This message contains an incentive for an user

content.example: we are happy to see your participation in the I-log app, you are doing a great job!

communityId.description: ID of the community related to the message

taskId.description: The identifier of the target task

IncentiveBadge.description: This is a badge of an incentive

imageUrl.description: the URL of the image of the badge

criteria.description: the criteria with which the badge was assigned
criteria.example: The user will get this badge for 50 relations in Twitter

message.description: a human-readable text to be shown to the user when she receives the badge
message.example: Congratulations! you just earned a new badge for your relations on Twitter

communityId.description: ID of the community related to the message

taskId.description: The identifier of the target task
